title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, and buttonhole stitches, with withdrawn element work with needle made fillings, on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 54.6 x 67.3 cm (21 1/2 x 26 1/2 in.)
description: Bands of whitework and withdrawn element work at top, with floral borders and geometric fills in polychrome silks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, stem, and buttonhole stitches, with withdrawn element work with needle made fillings, on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-384.
